comments.comments_text: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but Kerem Demirbay (Hoffenheim) takes it short.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes it short.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.

comments.comments_text: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) takes the corner but it's cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but it's cleared.

comments.comments_text: Marco Fritz shows a yellow card to Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) for his blatant foul.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [REFEREE] shows a yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for his blatant foul.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Lukasz Piszczek tees up Jadon Sancho (Dortmund) on the edge of the box and he fires the ball into the bottom left corner. 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] tees up [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) on the edge of the box and he fires the ball into the bottom left corner. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Kerem Demirbay (Hoffenheim) will deliver the corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) will deliver the corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Kerem Demirbay (Hoffenheim) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Dortmund take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Mario Gotze (Dortmund) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low into the middle of the net. It's 2:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low into the middle of the net. It's 2:0.

comments.comments_text: Julian Nagelsmann has made a change at the break. Ishak Belfodil (Hoffenheim) has come on in place of Andrej Kramaric.

comments.comments_text: Half-time substitution. Kerem Demirbay will not participate anymore and Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) is coming on.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Half-time substitution. [PLAYER] will not participate anymore and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is coming on.

comments.comments_text: The ball goes out of play. Hoffenheim are awarded a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The ball goes out of play. [TEAM] are awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Nico Schulz (Hoffenheim) takes the corner, but the goalkeeper jumps and gathers the ball.

comments.comments_text: Goal - 3:0! Mario Gotze laid the ball off to Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund), who shot from close range low into the back of the net, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

comments.comments_text: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: We are about to witness a subsitution. Paco Alcacer (Dortmund) for Maximilian Philipp.

comments.comments_text: Julian Nagelsmann has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Reiss Nelson (Hoffenheim) replacing Leonardo Bittencourt.

comments.comments_text: Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Ishak Belfodil (Hoffenheim) scores with a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner after being released inside the box by a superb lofted pass from Pavel Kaderabek. The score is now 3:1.

comments.comments_text: Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.

comments.comments_text: Mario Gotze will be replaced by Omer Toprak (Dortmund).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] will be replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Brilliant finish! Pavel Kaderabek (Hoffenheim) gathers a cross and steers a bullet header which bounces in off the left post.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Brilliant finish! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gathers a cross and steers a bullet header which bounces in off the left post.

comments.comments_text: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear. Dortmund earn a corner.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner, taken by Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund), comes to nothing. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Dortmund will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Ishak Belfodil (Hoffenheim) peels away from his marker to meet the resulting free kick from Dennis Geiger, and he steers a powerful header from near the penalty spot low inside the right post. What a finish that is - 3:3!

comments.comments_text: The main referee, Marco Fritz, is apparently not going to tolerate any discussions. Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) is given a yellow card for dissent.

comments.comments_text: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Marius Wolf (Dortmund) comes onto the pitch so that Raphael Guerreiro can be given a rest.

comments.comments_text: Jadon Sancho (Dortmund) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
